tweet_text: @cosmicvalkyrie AND if all else fails; Overtone has a “fader” shampoo which to me sounds like a glorified clarifying shampoo, but look into it if you need to. Just make sure you have a good conditioning mask on hand because clarifying shampoos are HARSH
